_description: Basic optical components - hard-coded primitives that cannot be modified

laser.name: Laser
laser.description: Coherent light source with specific wavelength
laser.typical_use: Pump source for nonlinear optics, coherent light for interferometry

source.name: General Light Source
source.description: Generic light source (incoherent or partially coherent)
source.typical_use: Incoherent sources, thermal light, placeholder sources

beam_splitter.name: Beam Splitter
beam_splitter.description: Splits incoming light into transmitted and reflected beams
beam_splitter.typical_use: Creating interferometers, dividing light paths, Hong-Ou-Mandel interference

dichroic_mirror.name: Dichroic Mirror / Dichroic
dichroic_mirror.description: Wavelength-selective mirror (reflects one wavelength, transmits another)
dichroic_mirror.typical_use: Separating pump from signal/idler in SPDC, filtering wavelengths

pellicle_beam_splitter.name: Pellicle Beam Splitter
pellicle_beam_splitter.description: Ultra-thin membrane beam splitter with minimal ghosting
pellicle_beam_splitter.typical_use: High-precision interferometry where ghost reflections are problematic

polarizing_beam_splitter.name: Polarizing Beam Splitter (PBS)
polarizing_beam_splitter.description: Splits light by polarization (H transmitted, V reflected, or vice versa)
polarizing_beam_splitter.typical_use: Separating orthogonal polarizations, Type-II SPDC output separation

mirror.name: Mirror
mirror.typical_use: Steering beams, creating optical paths, interferometer arms

concave_mirror.name: Concave/Curved Mirror
concave_mirror.description: Curved mirror for focusing or collimating
concave_mirror.typical_use: Cavity mirrors, beam focusing, optical cavities

faraday_mirror.name: Faraday Mirror
faraday_mirror.description: Rotates polarization by 45° on reflection to compensate birefringence

piezo_mirror.name: Piezo Mirror
piezo_mirror.description: Mirror with piezo-actuated fine position control
piezo_mirror.typical_use: Phase stabilization, active feedback, path length control

lens.name: Lens
lens.description: Converging or diverging lens for beam manipulation

cylindrical_lens.name: Cylindrical Lens
cylindrical_lens.typical_use: Astigmatism correction, line focusing, anamorphic beam shaping

phase_shifter.name: Phase Shifter
phase_shifter.typical_use: Interferometry, controlling relative phase between paths

polarizer.name: Polarizer
polarizer.typical_use: Defining polarization axis, filtering polarization states

half_wave_plate.name: Half-Wave Plate (HWP)
half_wave_plate.description: Rotates linear polarization by 2× the plate angle
half_wave_plate.typical_use: Polarization rotation, making photons indistinguishable for HOM

quarter_wave_plate.name: Quarter-Wave Plate (QWP)
quarter_wave_plate.typical_use: Creating circular polarization, polarization state manipulation

wave_plate.name: Generic Wave Plate
wave_plate.description: Retardation plate with arbitrary phase delay

pockels_cell.name: Pockels Cell
pockels_cell.typical_use: Fast switching, Q-switching, pulse picking, modulation

attenuator.name: Variable Attenuator
attenuator.description: Reduces light intensity without affecting other properties

optical_isolator.name: Optical Isolator
optical_isolator.description: Allows light to pass in only one direction (Faraday rotator + polarizers)
optical_isolator.typical_use: Protecting lasers from back-reflections, preventing feedback

circulator.name: Optical Circulator
circulator.description: Routes light between three or more ports in one direction

aperture.name: Aperture / Iris
aperture.typical_use: Spatial filtering, controlling beam size, blocking stray light

spatial_filter.name: Spatial Filter
spatial_filter.description: Lens-pinhole-lens system for cleaning beam profile
spatial_filter.typical_use: Removing higher-order spatial modes, creating clean Gaussian beams

pinhole.name: Pinhole
pinhole.description: Small aperture for spatial mode selection

beam_expander.name: Beam Expander / Telescope
beam_expander.description: Two-lens system to expand or compress beam diameter

collimator.name: Collimator
collimator.description: Converts diverging light into parallel beam
collimator.typical_use: Fiber output collimation, creating plane waves

spatial_light_modulator.name: Spatial Light Modulator (SLM)
spatial_light_modulator.description: Programmable phase/amplitude mask for wavefront shaping
spatial_light_modulator.typical_use: Beam steering, aberration correction, holography, orbital angular momentum

dmd.name: Digital Micromirror Device (DMD)
dmd.description: Array of tiny mirrors for binary amplitude modulation

crystal.name: Nonlinear Crystal
crystal.description: Material for frequency conversion via nonlinear processes
crystal.typical_use: Spontaneous parametric down-conversion (SPDC), second-harmonic generation (SHG), sum/difference frequency generation

bbo_crystal.name: BBO Crystal (β-Barium Borate)
bbo_crystal.description: Widely used for SPDC and SHG (UV-visible range)
bbo_crystal.typical_use: Entangled photon pair generation, UV/visible SPDC

ppln_crystal.name: PPLN Crystal (Periodically Poled Lithium Niobate)
ppln_crystal.description: Quasi-phase-matched crystal for near-IR nonlinear optics
ppln_crystal.typical_use: Telecom-wavelength SPDC, efficient near-IR frequency conversion

ktp_crystal.name: KTP Crystal (Potassium Titanyl Phosphate)
ktp_crystal.description: Common for green laser SHG (532nm from 1064nm)

photodiode.name: Photodiode
photodiode.description: Standard semiconductor photodetector for classical light

spad.name: Single-Photon Avalanche Diode (SPAD)
spad.typical_use: Single-photon counting, coincidence measurements, quantum key distribution

pmt.name: Photomultiplier Tube (PMT)
pmt.description: Vacuum tube with electron multiplication for single-photon sensitivity

snspd.name: Superconducting Nanowire Single-Photon Detector (SNSPD)
snspd.typical_use: Quantum communication, near-IR single-photon detection, ultra-fast timing

sipm.name: Silicon Photomultiplier (SiPM)
sipm.description: Array of SPADs with analog summation (compact, room-temperature)
sipm.typical_use: Photon counting with large area, LIDAR, PET scanners

homodyne_detector.name: Homodyne Detector
homodyne_detector.description: Balanced detector for measuring quadratures of quantum light
homodyne_detector.typical_use: Squeezed light measurement, continuous variable quantum optics

heterodyne_detector.name: Heterodyne Detector
heterodyne_detector.typical_use: Measuring both quadratures simultaneously, phase-sensitive detection

camera.name: Camera (CCD/CMOS)
camera.typical_use: Beam profiling, imaging, spatial mode analysis

double_slit.name: Double Slit
double_slit.description: Two parallel slits for interference experiments

etalon.name: Etalon / Fabry-Pérot
etalon.description: Two parallel partially-reflective surfaces for wavelength filtering

prism.name: Prism
prism.description: Dispersive element for wavelength separation via refraction

delay_stage.name: Delay Stage
delay_stage.description: Mechanical translation stage for optical path length tuning
delay_stage.typical_use: Temporal delay control, path length matching, scanning interferometry

aom.name: Acousto-Optic Modulator (AOM)
aom.description: Acoustic wave creates diffraction grating for frequency shifting
aom.typical_use: Frequency shifting, beam steering, intensity modulation, Q-switching

fiber.name: Optical Fiber
fiber.typical_use: Fiber-optic coupling, long-distance transmission, spatial filtering

fiber_coupler.name: Fiber Coupler
fiber_coupler.description: Evanescent-wave coupling between fibers (acts as fiber beam splitter)

optical_cavity.name: Optical Cavity
optical_cavity.description: Resonator formed by mirrors for light storage
optical_cavity.typical_use: Laser cavities, nonlinear optics enhancement, filtering

fabry_perot_cavity.name: Fabry-Pérot Cavity
fabry_perot_cavity.typical_use: High-resolution spectroscopy, wavelength locking, cavity QED

vapor_cell.name: Vapor Cell
vapor_cell.typical_use: Atomic spectroscopy, frequency references, quantum memory

atomic_filter.name: Atomic Filter
atomic_filter.typical_use: Ultra-narrow filtering, Faraday anomalous dispersion optical filter (FADOF)
